summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 7 January to end of Friday 7 January GMT
description: Cloudy on Friday with some sunshine and showers. <br/><br/>A 'clean' fresh south-westerly or westerly Atlantic breeze is expected for most of the day.<br/><br/>Air pollution is forecast to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates. <br/><br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
